name: Ashardalon's Stride
descricao:
The billowing flames of a dragon blast from your feet, granting you explosive speed. For the duration, your speed increases by 20 feet and moving doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks. 
	When you move within 5 feet of a creature or an object that isn’t being worn or carried, it takes 1d6 elemental damage from your trail of heat. A creature or object can take this damage only once during a turn. 
	**Enhance Spell.** For each extra 800 mana spent, you can add 5 feet to the spell's effect, up to 15 extra feet. For each extra 900 mana spent, you can add 1d6 to the spell's damage, up to 3d6 extra damage.
